about_the_game:
The story of an elderly bedridden man who is approaching the end of his life and is burdened with life's hardships and disappointments. In his altered and fading memories, he imagines himself as a little boy named Griffin who finds solace in the company of a teddy bear that embodies the spirit of his deceased son.



Trying to evade the ever-present grasp of Death itself, you will meet the most important characters of Griffin’s life in this mysterious world: a cruel and harsh father who turned into a giant knight, and a fragile but protective mother embodied in the form of a flower fountain.



Travel through a mysterious world of craggy caves and floating castles, fairytale forests and rolling plains. Prepare to be enthralled by the captivating world of Daydream, discover the transformative power of resilience, and accept the bittersweet beauty of letting go.

Key features


— Dive deep into a sprawling story, revealing secrets and unravelling the mysteries of an enchanting narrative;

— Step into an unforgettable world accompanied by dreamy melodies and mesmerizing music;

— Encounter memorable characters, such as the endearing young Griffin and his steadfast teddy bear companion Birly;

— Command an adorable teddy bear friend who assists you along the journey;

— Collect all memory moths to help Griffin find peace.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10, 64 bit
  • Processor: Intel CPU Core i3
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 460
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10, 64 bit
  • Processor: Intel CPU Core i7
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GPU GeForce GTX 660
  • DirectX: Version 11

reviews:
“It is an immersive journey through friendship, self-discovery, and life's intricacies, promising a rich and impactful experience that remains with players long after the game ends.”
— Spieltimes

“The story and gameplay seem simple at first but leave you with some deep thoughts once you finish the game.”
— Impulse Gamer

“The character design for both Griffin and Birly are adorable, meaning I felt very protective of both as they made their way through a sometimes cruel world.”
— Games Creed
short_description: Experience the altered memories of a dying man, reliving his entire life as a little boy while lying on his deathbed. Explore the profound depths of his subconscious as you assist Griffin to shed the remains of his miserable life before his impending demise.
